name: fsr-change-management
label: FortiSOAR Change Management
description: Synchronize the FortiSOAR Change Request record from one FortiSOAR instance to another

fields.title: Certificate File
fields.name: cert_file
fields.tooltip: Certificate .json file used to connect to the development or staging server
fields.description: Certificate .json file used to connect to the development or staging server

parameters.title: Change Request Payload
parameters.name: cr_payload
parameters.description: Specify the Change Request record payload which you want to sync with development server or staging server
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Change Request record payload which you want to sync with development server or staging server
